meaningMnemonic: An <kanji>earth</kanji> <kanji>earthquake</kanji> is just another way to say <vocabulary>earthquake</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. Notice that 地 is read as じ instead of ち. You've seen this happen a few times before, so just try to remember that this is the case here.
